name: CSSStyleRule
description: CSSStyleRule represents a single CSS style rule. It implements the CSSRule interface with a type value of 1 (CSSRule.STYLE_RULE).

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSStyleRule' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM).

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSRule' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification.
